channel.title: Oh - Hern [Genre?]
channel.description:
Still unsure what genre this is, but this is from something fun I've been doing on the side while I finish up bigger projects.
Song link is here (Runtime: 6:39) - https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/ohh
The full EP of this kind of stuff will be coming soon so stay tuned, hope u guys enjoy. Constructive criticism is welcome as always.

item.title: Oh - Hern [Genre?]
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
I like it, especially where the chord progression wanders off around the two minute mark. Nice.

Genre-wise, tricky to pin it down.
My first thought was that it had a complex Pop production style to it. I also felt that it might sit well amongst some artists commonly grouped under Downtempo.

…or somewhere in between the two.

Either way, I liked it.

Read full topic
